issues.title: Autoscroll on new message
issues.body:
If a conversation reaches the bottom of the browser window, the new messages don't scroll into view.
- There should be the ability to make the browser scroll a new message into view on arrival.
- If a user manually scrolls away from the bottom message, autoscroll should be disabled until they scroll back into view.

issues.title: python 3 support
issues.body: This shouldn't require much effort, perhaps a few tweaks to unicode->bytes conversion in `chatapp.queue`

issue_comments.body: Root cause of this bug is actually no sanitisation of the `subscriber` variable in `chatapp.views.ajax_handler`.  In the case that the subscriber is an empty string, zmq will return messages for all users.  Empty string should be checked and an error returned if the string is empty.
